Components

This section describes the component structure provided by battle-backbone

Just like Modules, Components are a way to organize reusable code within your application. The main difference is a semantic one; Modules are sections within your application (e.g. a page), Components let you share smaller bits (e.g. a modal dialog view) between your modules.

Technically, they work in exactly the same way as Modules with the exception that they are not bound to routes.
